item.description:
This film was nominated for an Oscar in 2008.

(France, 2007) Directed by Vincent Paronnaud and Marjane Satrapi. With the voices of: Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve and Danielle Darrieux. A mesmerizing animated film for mature children, teens (and adults) that is based on the graphic novels/memoirs of Marjane Satrapi. Growing up during Iran’s Islamic Revolution, a brave and intelligent young girl picks and chooses her allegiances from the opposing forces of family, religion, patriotism and punk rock.

Presented as part of The Tournées Festival, which is made possible with the support of the Cultural Services of the French Embassy and the French Ministry of Culture (CNC) 96 min.
